messages.title: Jo Swinson's Plan for Britain's Future:
messages.content: A Liberal Democrat government will stop Brexit and build a brighter future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A Liberal Democrat government will stop Brexit.
A commitment to tackle the climate emergency.
Plans to build a fair economy.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Aiming to give every child the best start in life.
An intention to transform mental health services.

issues.brexitEurope: A Liberal Democrat government will stop Brexit.
issues.economy: Plans to build a fair economy.
issues.education: Aiming to give every child the best start in life.
issues.environment: A commitment to tackle the climate emergency.
issues.health: An intention to transform mental health services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Dear friend, For too many people, things aren't working as they should be. It doesn't have to be this way. We have an ambitious plan for the future of our country, where every person, every community, can build a brighter future.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, 1 Vincent Square, London, SW1P 2PN

images.caption: Jo Swinson's plan for Britain's future.
